relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: then a very polite waiter came to take our food and wine order and helped us with the menus telling us the daily specials.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: in fact the food was great - wonderful starters - particularly good platters of charcuterie - and even better steaks with very good sides liked truffled potato dauphinoise.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: went there with the whole family for a birthday dinner after visiting once before on imulse - very nice atmosphere and very attentive and knowledgeable staff.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: with the restaurant diligently noting that I had asked for a quiet table and placed us on a table that was perfect for our date.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: will definitely return to give it a try perhaps when the sun goes and also head over for some happy hour cocktails at some point!
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: the place just had that natural warm welcoming atmosphere immediately you entered and all the staff were naturally friendly with a cheerful smiles and hello s.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: and it was with their accompanying fresh vegetables and horse radish that made you whimper as it hit the back of your throat and nasal passages.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: the portion sizes were excellent - I was so full after my excellent steak that the side-dishes required a joint effort from everyone sitting round the table.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: the polish bartender and the scottish table allocator at the door were both absolutely fab and both made me feel very welcome - very friendly and very lovely.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: we felt overall the meal was great value for very good quality food and the next time were in the area we will be sure to return!
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: all on all our guest and sponsor and staff had such a great evening that they didnt want to leave and wanted to stay for more drinks.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: we sat in the dining area and it felt like you really were in a restaurant ran by a family as the staff were absolutely fantastic - very attentive.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: I love the aesop toiletries in the bathroom btw theres an aesop shop in redchurch st if like me you fancy treating yourself and the cheese board is amazing!
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: the steak is perfectly cooked full of the smokiness from the charcoal and coming with some red wine juice on the side and a beautiful homemade porcini mushroom butter .
relevance.Title: Amazing concept , beautiful cocktails , best steaks!

relevance.Text: so the bar manager suggest to us a incredible bottle of cabernet savignon terra rossa from united states and was the best choose for our dishno words for both dish .
relevance.Title: Amazing concept , beautiful cocktails , best steaks!

relevance.Text: for drinks we had kernel pale ale on tap followed by a couple of cocktails - very strong and I would like to try them as part of an evening there another time.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: although I wouldnt recommend this place for serious business meetings since its a little bit loud I would recommend this place for meetings with business partners to have a great time and evening.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: it was also refreshing to have a drink at the bar upstairs beforehand with no pressure to go down to the restaurant we were 30minutes over our allocated time before being asked down .
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: we ate in the restaurant downstairs which was again really good atmosphere and decor as well as great food and had the best meal and dining experience ive had for a while in the shoreditch area.
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: the food was very tasty and well presented and the wine list was also very decent and we both really enjoyed our dining experience here and we will be back when we next return to london
relevance.Title: Owner response

relevance.Text: home-made rose syrup muddle cucumber and prosecco is well presented and taste amazingat the table the waitress introduce her self with a beautiful smile on her face and mention the special and her recommendation from the menu .
relevance.Title: Amazing concept , beautiful cocktails , best steaks!

relevance.Text: the main restaurant is downstairs and there is a particularly nice bar with a long-list of funky and intriguing cocktails on the upstairs floor - which was perfect for a nice relaxed drink before heading down to our table.
relevance.Title: Owner response
